full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN PO BODHI SA TVA'I MDZAD PA'I GRIB BSEL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES YUNGS DKAR GYIS BRAB CING YI DAM GYI SNGAGS BSHAM DU SUMBHA NI DRAG TU BRJOD PAS BSKRAD, GLUD RGYANG RING POR BSKYAL BA, PHYI MIG MI BLTA BAR 'ONG, YID CHE SHING KHUNGS BTZUN PA'I GRIB BSEL 'DI MKHAN PO BODHI SVA TVA'I MDZAD PA, DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI GRIB BYANG ZHING DAG PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
